steps.name: I am on Home Page
I Mouse Hover on Gear Menu
I Click on Bags
I click On Product Name "Overnight Duffle"
I should be able to Verify the Text "Overnight Duffle"
I change the Qty to 3 on Product
I  Click On "Add To Cart" Button
I verify the text "You added Overnight Duffle to your shopping cart"

arguments.val: You added Overnight Duffle to your shopping cart

steps.name: I click on "shopping cart" link into Message
Verify Product Name "Overnight Duffle"
Verify the Qty to"3"
Verify the Product Price "$135.00"
I change the Qty to"5"
I clicking on "Update Shopping Cart" button
Verify the Updated Product Price "$225.00"

name: Gear Test
description: As user I want to Add Product Successfully On Women Page

elements.name: User should add product to the shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover on men menu
I mouse hover on bottoms
I click on pants
I mouse hover on product name "Cronus Yoga Pant"
I click on size "32"
I click on color "Black"
I click on add to cart button
I should be able to verify the text "You added Cronus Yoga Pant to your shopping cart"

arguments.val: You added Cronus Yoga Pant to your shopping cart

steps.name: I click on shopping cart link into message
I should be able to verify the text "Shopping Cart." on men page
I should be able to verify the product name "Cronus Yoga Pant"
I should be able to verify the product size 32
I should be able to verify the product colour "Black"
I should be able to add product to the shopping cart successfully

name: Men Test
description: As a user I want to add product to shopping cart from men category page on software testing board website

elements.name: Verify user should be able to verify product Name in alphabetical order on Page

I Mouse Hover On Women Menu

name: Women Test
description: As user I want to verify Sort By Filter on Women Page
